title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection does not work as expected. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a file in the library.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. 

Observed Behavior: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to a file in the library.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
